dialogue: Oh, there's not very much to tell, really... I'm just a girl from a very small town in... Indiana.
I'm sure you've never heard of it... in fact, it's not even a town... I'm not really sure you could even call it a village... A farm perhaps? .
...But for as long as I can remember, it has always been my dream to be on screen...
MY dream!
...as a child I used to put on shows for my family...
"Jurassic fitness"...
I'll fucking show you Jurassic fitness.
...But my mother was a huge fan of hers. Every morning, rain or shine, "Sparkle your life" was on TV.
So in a way I grew up with her - whether I liked it or not! I guess that's why I can say we have some sort of connection.
"Some sort of connection?!"
Without ME YOU DON'T EVEN EXIST!!!
"I just try to be myseeeeelf... to be sinceeeere and graaatefuuuuul for all that I haaaaave..."
YOU'RE TAKING IT FROM ME!! That's your secret!! YOU'RE TAKING IT ALL
Stop it stop it stop it you have to...
I can't go back inside her...
I just can't...
The delicate silk material on that horribly old and disgusting leg...
She's GROSS...
Fat...
Old...
Disgusting.
